languages.text: "Кайся, нечистая душа! Исповедуйся во грехе! Ведаешь, кто навел пиратов на клипер "Святой Когнаций"?! Сам там душегубствовал?! Или только на стреме стоял?!"

"Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"
languages.original_text: "Кайся, нечистая душа! Исповедуйся во грехе! Ведаешь, кто навел пиратов на клипер "Святой Когнаций"?! Сам там душегубствовал?! Или только на стреме стоял?!"

traits.locale_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your sin! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"
"Repent, unclean soul! Confess your sin! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"
"Repent, unclean soul! Confess your sin! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"
"Repent, unclean soul! Confess your sin! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

"Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

languages.text: “忏悔吧，不洁的灵魂！忏悔你的过错吧！你知道是谁给海盗提供了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯号的消息吗？你当时也杀人了吗？还是说，你只是负责放风而已？”
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: “忏悔吧，不洁的灵魂！忏悔你的罪过吧！你知道是谁给海盗提供了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯号的消息吗？你当时也杀人了吗？还是说，你只是负责放风而已？”

languages.text: «¡Arrepiéntete, alma impía! ¡Confiesa tus faltas! ¿Sabes quién fue quien les habló a los piratas de la clíper San Cognatius? ¿Fuiste uno de los asesinos? ¿O solo estabas observando?».
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Arrepiéntete, alma impía! ¡Confiesa tu pecado! ¿Sabes quién fue quien les habló a los piratas de la clíper San Cognatius? ¿Fuiste uno de los asesinos? ¿O solo estabas observando?».

languages.text: 「悔い改めろ、汚れた魂よ！己の過ちを告白するのだ！クリッパー船の聖コグナティウスの情報を、海賊に流した者を知っているか？お前も殺人犯のひとりか？それともただの見張りか？」
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: 「悔い改めろ、汚れた魂よ！己の過ちを告白するのだ！クリッパー船の聖コグナティウスの情報を、海賊に流した者を知っているか？お前も殺人犯のひとりか？それともただの見張りか？」

languages.text: "Bereut, unreine Seele! Gesteht Eure Verfehlungen! Wisst Ihr, wer den Piraten den Tipp über den Clipper St. Cognatius gegeben hat? Gehörtet Ihr zu den Mördern dort? Oder wart Ihr nur auf Beobachtungsposten?"
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: "Bereut, unreine Seele! Beichtet Eure Sünde! Wisst Ihr, wer den Piraten den Tipp über den Clipper St. Cognatius gegeben hat? Gehörtet Ihr zu den Mördern dort? Oder wart Ihr nur auf Beobachtungsposten?"

languages.text: « Repentez-vous, âme corrompue ! Confessez-vous ! Savez-vous qui a averti les pirates au sujet du clipper Saint Cognatius ? Étiez-vous l'un de ces meurtriers ? Ou faisiez-vous simplement le guet ? »
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: « Repentez-vous, âme corrompue ! Confessez vos péchés ! Savez-vous qui a averti les pirates au sujet du clipper Saint Cognatius ? Étiez-vous l'un de ces meurtriers ? Ou faisiez-vous simplement le guet ? »

languages.text: "Kirli ruhlu fâni, tövbe et! Suçlarını itiraf et! Aziz Cognatius gemisiyle ilgili malumatı korsanlara kim iletti? Sen de mi oradaki katillerdendin? Yoksa erketecilik mi yapıyordun?"
languages.original_text: "Repent, unclean soul! Confess your wrongdoings! Do you know of the one who tipped off the pirates about the clipper Saint Cognatius? Were you one of the murderers there? Or were you just playing lookout?"

traits.locale_text: "Kirli ruh, tövbe et! Suçlarını itiraf et! Aziz Cognatius gemisiyle ilgili malumatı korsanlara kim iletti? Sen de mi oradaki katillerdendin? Yoksa erketecilik mi yapıyordun?"
